reapack.name: HackeyPatterns_exec.lua
reapack.desc: Hackey-Patterns: An interface plugin for REAPER 5.x and up designed to mimick the sequencer in Jeskola Buzz.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added insert and delete functionality.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Started work on add pattern functionality. Still have to make sure that when patterns are deleted, the media item adjacent is also stretched to fill up the space.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Stretch last media item.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added mending to backspace operator.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added mending to insert operator.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix y scrolling issue.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Worked on automation.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Worked on pattern renaming. + Started work on mouse actions.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added MUTE/SOLO options. + Improved rendering (no lines in continuous items. + Show non-MIDI media items in a different color. + Added track renaming (outer mouse click). + Added pattern renaming (outer mouse click). + Added drag clipboard (no actual clipboard functionality available yet).

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Middle mouse uniqueifies a pattern (un-ghost/un-pool).

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Zero is zero ;) + Added play from / play toggle. + Display current play position. + Added looping commands (CTRL + Q/W in default layout).

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Integrated with Hackey Trackey (doubleclick a pattern in the sequencer)

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added subtle whole row highlighting for current line.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Add pattern deletion button (deletes it from the pool and song) + Added undo and redo + Added usage highlighting when hovering over patterns in pattern list

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fixed issue with pattern precision when calculating pattern display. + Added global eps parameter rather than using hardcoded values everywhere.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Add tab/shift+tab for movement along columns. + Add mousewheel movement.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix issue with pattern coloring. + Default mousewheel scrolls 4, shift mousewheel scrolls 1. + Added more use of the position stack to make sure positions are preserved when executing commands. + Added command for Open HT (enter is default). + Added insert / remove / clear row (CTRL+Backspace/Insert/Delete)

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added some checking for empty tables + Preserve ordering

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added option to follow track column. + Added option to follow location.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Allow visualization of mute status. + Improved renoise color scheme. + Added zoom (+/-) + Added panic (F12) + Added theme switching (F11)

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix redraw bug + Added OFF marker (still a known bug with opening hackey trackey on such a tiny item)

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Make sure HT isn't opened on OFF symbols or wave media items. + Make sure OFF symbols cannot be uniqueified. + Only update internal data when user is interacting with the plugin. + Fix display location of wave data.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Handle automation on the main arranger.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Improvements to automation handling.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Actually assign name to unnamed items. + Bugfix OFF placement (used to always go to first column). + Split action added.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Set pool position super late.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Start pattern indexing at 0.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix OFF visibility under cursor issue.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Push OFF slight further to right.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added option in cfg file for asymmetric scrolling.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Also deal with pcm based media items.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix incorrect drag behaviour when scrolled away from 0,0. + Copy/Cut/Paste behaviour. + Major bugfix in automation copy mechanism (used to be able to copy wrong items due to resorting).

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fixed crash bug that attempted to display columns past end. + Added alt + doubleclick to open MIDI with normal piano roll. + Added track colors (where available).

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Bugfix automation copy mechanism. + Bugfix regarding extremely long items. + Fixed track numbering to be analogous to reaper itself (start at 1). + Hide tracks set to invisible. + Click left bar to set play position. + Fix order problem with insert.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Switch alt + doubleclick to ctrl+doubleclick on Linux. + Parse colors using colorFromNative. + Added horizontal scrollbar when nTracks > FOV. + Fix mapping solo. + Force cursor in range when number of columns change.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Improve sizing row indicator. + Add help file.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Bugfix scrollbar. + Added option to create new items (CTRL + Drag).

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix nil bug when dragging from timeline into column. + Add Ctrl + Enter as key to make new item based on loop selection. + Add Ctrl + PgUp/PgDown to shift loop up / down by loopsize.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Lump all copy to pool actions into single action to avoid polluting the undo list too much.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Changed Ctrl + Enter behaviour. + Maintain pool order. + Improved rename all (F5) behaviour

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + When follow row is on, actually follow on the timeline. + Added option for minimal pattern display (set tinyPatterns to 1 in the config file). + Added vertical scrollbar.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Change name reaper-kb.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added option to close pattern window when hackey trackey is opened.
